module-credits.settings.allowHTMLforAllS: Allow HTML Parse to parse all Module Settings
If this is enabled, Module Credits will parse all Module Settings, titles and notes/hints and format them.
module-credits.settings.showWiki.name: Add Wiki Tag
module-credits.settings.showWiki.hint: If the module contains the `readme` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
module-credits.settings.showIssues.name: Add Issues Tag
module-credits.settings.showIssues.hint: If the module contains the `bugs` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
module-credits.settings.showChangelog.hi: If the module contains the `changelog` property, this will add a clickable tag that will take you to that url
module-credits.settings.fetchLocalChange: Allow module credits to search module directories for local `changelog.md` files.
